title: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting "Add Javadoc" from the context menu on a field in TH, nothing happens.
EB: When selecting "Add Javadoc" from the context menu on a field in TH, the action should add the field's Javadoc. Alternatively, the menu option should be removed.
SR:
1. Open the software.
2. Navigate to the TH (Table Header) section.
3. Right-click on a field.
4. Select "Add Javadoc" from the context menu.
